bill.summary:
Federal Reserve Disclosure Act
This bill amends the Federal Reserve Act to apply personal financial interest restrictions and disclosures currently applicable to employees of the Securities and Exchange Commission to members and employees of the Federal Reserve Board (FRB). The bill also provides for office staff for FRB members.
